tools.name: Circle Tool (Pendulum)
tools.description: Circle Tool customizes the trajectory of the [url=https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=section&s=smwsprites&f%5Bname%5D=pendulum]Pendulum[/url] sprites.

tools.name: Drum Fixer
tools.description: This tool convert each note in MML into labels, which is helpful for dealing with percussion channels.

tools.name: Duplicate Map16 Tile Finder
tools.description: Detects duplicate tiles in .map16 files exported from Lunar Magic.

tools.name: .pal Generator
tools.description: Creates .pal files from screenshots of Lunar Magic's palette editor. May or may not be useful when you edit palettes in an external tool and don't want to copy each color back over manually.

tools.name: ROMclean
tools.description: This tool checks if your ROM is a clean, headered (U) [!] ROM, suitable for use here. If it's unclean, it tries to clean it.

tools.name: SA1 Hybridizer
tools.description: Attempts to make LoROM ASM files compatible with both LoROM and SA-1.

tools.name: SNES/PC Address Converter
tools.description: Converts between SNES and PC addresses.
